name: Epoxy resin coatings otherwise complying with 21 CFR 175.300(b)(3)(viii) that also contain 9,10-anthracenedione, 1-hydroxy-4-((4-methylphenyl)amino)- (C.I. Solvent Violet 13) as a pigment
FoodContactSubstance: Epoxy resin coatings otherwise complying with 21 CFR 175.300(b)(3)(viii) that also contain 9,10-anthracenedione, 1-hydroxy-4-((4-methylphenyl)amino)- (C.I. Solvent Violet 13) as a pigment (CAS Reg. No. 81-48-1).
